data.title: Talent Agencies in South Carolina: Top 13 Talent Agencies in South Carolina
data.text:
Talent agencies represent professionals across the creative industry and essentially work as marketers and brokers to promoter their clients and handle any enquiries. They may actively seek new opportunities for their clients or they may handle incoming enquiries. There are many South Carolina Talent Agencies available, and choosing the right one for you could make a big difference in the opportunities you are provided with. A talent agency which is well suited to your needs and aspirations can make the world of difference to your career.

You might also be interested in:

âModeling Agencies in South Carolina

Coastal Talent Agency

Coastal Talent Agency is the premiere full-service talent agency based in Charleston, South Carolina. They find engaging, exciting and experience talent for television, film, commercial, print, corporate industrials, and voiceover projects throughout the Southeast and across the country.

Web address: https://coastaltalent.com/

Phone Number: 843.886.8898

Address: P.O. Box 1142, Isle of Palms, SC 29451

â

Z1 Models and Talent

Z1 provides a full-service agency service doing film, print, commercial, promotions, model placement internationally, and Z1 also represents entertainers, and casting for motion picture films.

Web address: https://www.z1modelsandtalent.com [https://www.z1modelsandtalent.com/about]

Phone number: 803.581.CAST

Address: 141 Gadsden St, Chester, SC 29706

â

Gowns & Crowns

At Growns & Crowns it is my personal goal to make your pageant preparation a growing experience that is not only rewarding, but fun!! Whether you want to be a school queen, a festival sweetheart, state queen, or national winner, let me use my 30+ years experience in public speaking, judging, directing, producing, emceeing, and wardrobe consulting, to assist you in making your pageant package a well rounded presentation.

Web address: https://www.gownsandcrowns.com/

Phone number: 803.750.7778

Address: 1593 Broad River Road, Columbia, SC 29210

â

Stisa Talent Agency

Stisa Talent Agency is the premier talent agency in South Carolina for actors, models, and voiceover artists. Our clients include Fortune 500 companies as well as local business owners. Our actors and models can be seen in feature films besides A-listers, national TV commercials, nationally broadcast television shows, national print ads, and runway shows.

Web address: http://stisatalent.com/

Phone Number: 864-380-1284

Address: 222 East Blackstock Road Suit G, Spartanburg, SC 29301

â

Millie Lewis of Charleston Model & Talent Agency

Millie Lewis Agency trains models and actors for placement assistance in local and major markets such as New York, Los Angeles, Chicago, Atlanta, and Miami as well as in markets overseas.

Web address: http://www.millielewischarleston.com/success%20stories

Phone Number: 843-571-7781

Address: 217 South Cedar Street, Suite B, Summerville, SC 29483

â

CDMT

Established in Charleston, South Carolina in 1997, CDMT offers connections across the world with agencies, production companies, casting directors, managers. Their focus in on discovering, developing and networking with Models, Actors, Singers, Real Families and Dancers in Print, Television, Film, Commercials, Stage and Voiceover.

Web address: https://www.cdmtagency.com/

Phone Number: 843.849.2559

Address: 1240 Winnowing Way, 102 Mt. Pleasant, SC 29466

â

EastCoast Entertainment

EastCoast Entertainment is Charlestonâs premier source for unforgettable entertainment. Our database of over 8,000 entertainers includes everything from the best bands for hire to DJs, comedians, and specialty entertainment guaranteeing a one-stop solution for all of our clients.

Web address: https://www.bookece.com [https://www.bookece.com/locations/charleston]

Phone Number: 843.856.9922

Address: 1039 D Anna Knapp Boulevard, Mount Pleasant, SC 29464

â

Ear for Music

We are a full-service entertainment agency that specializes in providing one-of-a kind events with the music industryâs hottest stars, emerging talent, and local favorites. EFM thrives in talent buying, production management, and full service concert or festival promotion. We deliver a unique listening experience for any performance setting. We handle all elements from the artist booking to the final encore. We are All Things Music.

Web Address: https://www.earformusic.com [https://www.earformusic.com/]

Phone Number: 843.881.0039

Address: 1135 Daffodil Lane, Mt Pleasant, SC 29464

â

Bellah Modeling Agency

Bellah Modeling Agency is specifically designed to build the confidence of young men and women in the modeling industry. They are passionate about creating positive environments for students to learn new skills and grow in the modeling profession. They take great pride in the quality of education and help provided to students, and also the quality of work the students produce.

Web address: https://www.bellahmodelingagency.com/

Phone number: 803.728-6979

Address: 1612 Marion Street Suit, 329 Columbia, SC 29201

â

The DeAbreu Agency

The DeAbreu Agency is owned by Ericka DeArbreu. Operating in Columbia, SC for over 13 years, they are a thriving acting and modeling agency. Ericka herself was a successful professional model, and felt it was time to give back and help aspiring actors and models, by giving them the tools needed for success in the industry. Ericka has successfully placed talent in national international and local campaigns, including print, commercials, films and sitcoms and much more.

Web address: http://deabreumodeling.com/

Phone number: 803.788.9051

Address: 720 Old Clemson Road, Suit J. Columbia, SC, 29229.

â

Industry Direct Model & Talent Placement

Industry Directâs counting prowess and unique development approach is sought after by major agencies world wide. New talent is showcased at the largest such convention in the world - the International Models and Talent Association (IMTA). This is held twice each year, and attracts more than 500 agents, directors and producers.

Web address: https://www.industrydirectmodels.com/

Phone Number: 843-225-1834

Address: 8887 Old University Blvd, Suite 216 North Charleston, SC 29406

â

Carolina Talent Agency

Carolina Talent is Charlotteâs longest-running and most respected modeling agency. Established during the 1960âs and incorporated in the 1980âs, Carolina Talent has served the Fashion industry longer than any other.

Web address: https://www.carolinatalent.us/

Phone Number: 704.332.3218

Address: 1230 West Morehead Street, Charlotte, NC 28208

â

Telford Talent

Telford Talent provide the best up & coming talent in the Carolinaâs. Located in Columbia, South Carolina, we currently provide acts that include full-scale magic, music, and/or spoken word poetry. We understand the financial limitations of programming dollars (were former student programmers who rocked the ramen every night diet), and can be flexible with costs and deadlines.

Web address: http://www.telfordtalent.com [http://www.telfordtalent.com/]

Phone Number: 803.467.7979

Address: 7905 Turnbridge Lane, Columbia, SC 29223

â

As you can see above there is a great selection of South Carolina talent agencies, some with offer a broad range of services and others which offer you a specialized and niche services. In South Carolina, you really are spoilt for choice for top talent agencies.

â
